title: [FR] Can log_metrics log a pandas.DataFrame?

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

labels.name: area/sqlalchemy
labels.description: Use of SQL alchemy in tracking service or model registry

body:
### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute this feature at this time.

### Proposal Summary

Sometimes I have already got a table from 3rd package and I want to log the table to mlflow.

### Motivation

For instance, I can get a numpy arry or pandas.DataFrame to respresent the GPU or CPU usage every 2 seconds from a sub-threading during the model's training. And I do not want to use for loop to log the table because it is very slow. Is it possible to log a series of data into mlflow in one time?  

### Details

_No response_
